title: Calories in Cane's 3 Finger Combo
meta_description: Discover calories in canes 3 finger combo, including full nutrition breakdown with protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and tweaks for customization.
assumptions: Includes 3 chicken fingers, crinkle-cut fries, coleslaw, Texas toast, and 1 serving Cane's sauce; drink excluded.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, preparation, and customizations. Check Raising Cane's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: Raising Cane's 3 Finger Combo totals about 1260 kcal with 50g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in Cane's 3 finger combo?
faqs.a: Approximately 1260 kcal for the standard combo.

faqs.q: What's the protein in canes 3 finger combo?
faqs.a: About 50 g protein, mostly from the chicken fingers.

faqs.q: Is the sodium high in Cane's 3 finger combo?
faqs.a: Yes, around 3000 mg due to sauce, fries, and seasoning.

faqs.q: Calories in just the 3 chicken fingers from Cane's?
faqs.a: About 390 kcal for the tenders alone.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in canes 3 finger combo?
faqs.a: Skip the sauce and fries to reduce by 580 kcal.
